exceptions.tactic: intros P0 HP0 HP1 HP2 l H.
intros P0 HP0' HP1 HP2 l H.
intros P0 HP0' HP1' HP2 l H.
intros P0 HP0' HP1' HP2' l H.
intros P0 HP0' HP1' HP2' l' H.

original: intros P0 HP0 HP1 HP2 l H. induction H. - apply HP0. - destruct l. + apply HP1. + apply HP2. * apply nat_sorted_head_inv in H. apply H. * apply IHnat_sorted. apply nat_sorted_cons_inv in H. apply H.
